column4: Hey everyone, happy Sunday :) I'm currently working on a PC that needs a windows XP reformat, but due to its condition, the whole drive must be formatted first.  When running GParted, I cannot touch this disk because it is the boot disk, and has the lock icon on it.  How can I format this disk right now?
I think a liveCD would be the way to go
mister_roboto: I'm on the Live CD right now.
